analysis.description:
Pinakion.balances (/unique_chucks/26/0x3b3a01d42c9cd96d428eb07a708c6b2d9925ae15.sol#279-281) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/26/0x3b3a01d42c9cd96d428eb07a708c6b2d9925ae15.sol#378-414)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/26/0x3b3a01d42c9cd96d428eb07a708c6b2d9925ae15.sol#486-507)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0x3b3a01d42c9cd96d428eb07a708c6b2d9925ae15.sol#579-593)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0x3b3a01d42c9cd96d428eb07a708c6b2d9925ae15.sol#604-615)
Pinakion.isContract (/unique_chucks/26/0x3b3a01d42c9cd96d428eb07a708c6b2d9925ae15.sol#678-687) is declared view but contains assembly code

BlockHashRNGFallback.saveRN (/unique_chucks/26/0x3b3a01d42c9cd96d428eb07a708c6b2d9925ae15.sol#872-887) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _block < block.number && randomNumber[_block] == 0
